title: UAS-Based Secondary STEM Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational STEM knowledge and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Blended training and collaborative learning environment for utilizing drone-based educational tools

learning_goals: Understand and apply UAS operational safety standards (FAA recommendations) at 80% or higher proficiency
Develop three or more STEM education scenarios using UAS simulation tools
Collaborative learning teams can submit UAS-integrated lesson designs meeting project-based assessment criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
